Title: Relates to transition feasibility analysis for zero-emission buses
Summary: Requires every school district to conduct a transition feasibility analysis within the current school year as of the effective date of this subdivision, and every five years thereafter, to determine the feasibility of using zero-emission school buses on current routes.
LawCode: Amd ยง3638 & 3623-a, Ed L; amd Part A ยง35, Chap 56 of 2023
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to transition feasibility analysis for zero-emission school buses; and to amend part A of chapter 56 of the laws of 2023 amending the education law relating to contracts for excellence, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
